code:
```verilog
module TopModule (
    input logic clk,
    input logic j,
    input logic k,
    output logic Q
);

    always_ff @(posedge clk) begin
        case ({j, k})
            2'b00: Q <= Q;        // Hold state
            2'b01: Q <= 1'b0;     // Reset
            2'b10: Q <= 1'b1;     // Set
            2'b11: Q <= ~Q;       // Toggle
            default: Q <= 1'b0;   // Default safe state, though unreachable
        endcase
    end

endmodule
```
